## Testing

```bash
cd pkg && go test ./...
# or for specific package:
cd pkg && go test ./core/vm/...
```

- [ ] All existing tests pass (`go test ./...`)
- [ ] New tests added for changed functionality
- [ ] Tested manually (describe below)

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows the project's coding guidelines
- [ ] Code is formatted with `gofmt`
- [ ] No secrets, credentials, or private keys included
- [ ] Commit messages follow `pkg: description` format
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed (EIP_SPEC_IMPL.md, GAP_ANALYSIS.md)
- [ ] Files stay under ~500 LOC
